title: Tyler1 Vs C9 Jensen
body:
K I have been wanting to post this for so fucking long as soon as I saw the Infamous League Players video. Tyler1 is just a toxic man on stream and in game chat but that doesn't affect the person on the other end. Jensen has been caught fucking DDosing people and he is allowed to play competitively and it "Seems" that Riot was just bias at the time. Of course they aren't now as Tyler is supposedly being unbanned. I was actually given a perma ban for telling someone to KYS and actually have a post up on it. If riot could treat everyone equally and not suck all the famous league players that would lead to a better community and getting rid of people who troll and are toxic and etc.... 

Rito help{{item:3070}}
